name: Hobo KO!
description:
Ever wondered what it would be like as a Hobo Fighting other Hobos?

Well now you can!

Fight other Hobos, Level up your hobo, Unlock Skills and Upgrade your stats!

Explore an Endless 2d Runner to collect cans! Visit a Can Collecting Machine!

Hire other Hobos to help you out! 

All this and not much else on Hobo KO!

Thanks for checking out my first Itch.io game! I appreciate you tons!
